transcript_segments.text: So I’ve sautéed everything for a while, and it has cooked nicely. I sautéed it for 15 minutes. At this point, we’ll add a little water, mix it well, and cover it until it’s cooked.

Always use a large pot for cooking rice. The water has come to a nice boil. Now we’ll add about 1 kg of Basmati rice, which I had soaked beforehand. The rice is of very good quality.
Now we’ll add the juice of half a lemon. This adds a wonderful aroma and a great flavor. We’ll also add one tablespoon of desi ghee. Ghee prevents the rice from sticking and gives it a lovely aroma.
